entry.title: Water Based Pomade - Matte
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Pomade
Price: 18.00

Water based pomades are the modern day versions of old school oil based pomades.  With our water based pomade, changing your style throughout the day is as easy as wetting your hair slightly.  Once set you'll have a flexible medium hold that stays soft and manageable all day long.  This pomade has a matte finish.

The other great thing about these pomades are that they wash out easily in one or two washes unlike their oil based counterparts.  

  • Medium to Heavy hold that lasts
  • Soft and easy to apply
  • No buildup and easy to wash out
  • Matte finish

Available in 2 scents:

Black Salt + Mountain Air

Sweet Tobacco.

Large 4 ounce low profile jar.

Ingredients: Aqua, Behentrimonium Methosulfate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Cera Microcristallina, Beeswax, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Fragrance, Stearic Acid, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Lanolin, Propylene Glycol, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol.

entry.title: Oil Based Pomade - Matte
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Pomade
Price: 18.00

Oil based pomades have been around forever.  Old school pomades is why the term "Greaser" was coined.  When hair is styled using oil based pomades it never really dries and is easily reworked throughout the day.  Our pomade contains both petrolatum and lanolin which are both great for moisturizing both hair and scalp.  If used correctly you won't have greasy buildup.

Our pomade is a heavy hold without weighing your hair down.  This pomade has a matte finish.

  • Heavy hold
  • Soft and easy to apply
  • Restyleable
  • Matte finish

Classic scent of Mahogany Woods and Vanilla.

Ingredients: Petrolatum, Cera Microcristallina, Beeswax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Kaolin, Lanolin, Fragrance.
